channel.title: Humanitarian relief on Ventory | The Best Solution for Inventory Management
channel.description: Recent content in Humanitarian relief on Ventory | The Best Solution for Inventory Management

item.title: Ventory stands with Ukraine and makes the solution available for free for all aid organizations in Ukraine
item.description: Given the current situation and Ventory’s roots in humanitarian aid, we have decided as a team to offer our remote inventory management solution for free to all aid organisations trying to establish field operations in Ukraine.
